A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form a posse to destroy the animal since they don’t believe in psychiatry. Well, turns out Alice’s father and husband are still alive. It is revealed that Alice is related to Katharine Isabella but also a descendant of John Harris, the man she murdered years ago.
